challenges.name: Death Mountain
challenges.description: Survive the treacherous Death Mountain and reach the summit.

requirements.description: Reach a score of at least 1000 points

challenges.name: Numbers Challenge
challenges.description: Solve the numbers puzzle and achieve the target score.

requirements.description: Complete the puzzle with at least 500 points

challenges.name: Glitch in the System
challenges.description: Navigate through the glitching digital realm and defuse the bomb.

requirements.description: Defuse the bomb with at least 750 points
